title: G.C.E. Advanced Level (A/L) - Bio Science Stream
description: Achieve a high Z-score in the G.C.E. A/L Bio Science stream. A strong understanding of Biology is essential for admission into the highly competitive BSc in Physiotherapy degree programs.
qualifications: G.C.E. A/L (Bio Science) with high Z-score

title: Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Physiotherapy
description: Complete the 4-year BSc (Hons) in Physiotherapy degree from a recognized university. The curriculum includes anatomy, physiology, kinesiology, and hands-on clinical training.
institutes: General Sir John Kotelawala Defence University (KDU)

title: Internship and Professional Registration
description: Undergo a mandatory one-year clinical internship in a government hospital. This provides supervised, practical experience across different specialities like orthopedics, neurology, and pediatrics. After completion, register with the Sri Lanka Medical Council (SLMC).

title: Practicing Physiotherapist
description: Work as a licensed physiotherapist in a government or private hospital, a rehabilitation center, or a private practice. You can start specializing in areas like sports physiotherapy, neuro-physiotherapy, or geriatric care.

title: Senior Physiotherapist / Private Practice Owner
description: With significant experience, you can become a Senior Physiotherapist, leading a department and mentoring junior staff. Many experienced physiotherapists also choose to open their own private clinics. A Master's degree (MSc) can lead to teaching or research positions.
qualifications: MSc in a specialized area of physiotherapy
